name: Get In "The Clique" 2 Online Quiz | Authors | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who got the role of Molly Reynolds?
questions.explanation:
Claire.

	Claire replaced Hadley as Molly because Hadley refused to work with Abby.

questions.text: Who planned Massie and Claire's Halloween party? This is in the book "Best Friends For Never".
questions.explanation:
Landon Dorsey.

	Landon Dorsey is a professional party planner.

questions.text: Who did Alicia bring back with her from Spain? This is in the book "Invasion of the Boy-Snatchers."
questions.explanation:
her cousin.

	Her cousin's name is Nina.

questions.text: Who was Claire's first best friend at OCD?
questions.explanation:
Layne.

	Layne's last name is Abeley.

questions.text: Who does Claire have a crush on throughout most of the series? This starts in the book "Best Friends For Never" and continues throughout the series.
questions.explanation:
Cam.

	Cam's last name is Fisher.

questions.text: Who does Kristen go to the famous couples dance with? This is in the book "Sealed With a Diss."
questions.explanation:
Griffin.

	Kristen goes as the Bride of Chucky and Griffin goes as Chucky.

questions.text: Who do Massie and Derrington go to the dance as? This is in the book "Sealed With a Diss".
questions.explanation:
David and Victoria.

	David and Victoria's last name is Beckham.

questions.text: Who cleans Josh's room?  This is in the book "Sealed With a Diss."
questions.explanation:
Josh's sister.

	Josh makes his sister clean his room by kidnapping her dolls.

questions.text: Who do Alicia and Olivia get to replace Kristen and Dylan? This is in the book "Revenge of the Wannabees.
options: they don't replace Kristen and Dylan
questions.explanation:
Kori and Strawberry.

	They get Kori to replace Kristen and Strawberry to replace Dylan.

questions.text: What is Strawberry's real first name? This is in the book "Revenge of the Wannabees."
questions.explanation:
Coral.

	She got the nickname Strawberry because she shops at the store Strawberry.
